description:
With this DLC you will unlock access to VIP competitions and over 100 decorations:
- sprinkles for cookies and donuts
- toppers and 3D decorations for birthday and wedding cakes
- 2D and 3D decorations for princess cakes
- straws for cocktails
- decorations for cupcakes

Additionally you will get 1500 coins to buy clothes, bakeries or ingredients.

Decorate donuts, cookies, cupcakes, cocktails, and cakes just how you want using your new lovely decorations and taste the sweet victory in VIP contests!
name: My Bakery Empire: Bake With Taste DLC
